languages.text:
Warriors are combatants boasting exceptional {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} prowess, capable of dealing high damage in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.
languages.original_text:
Воины демонстрируют исключительную эффективность в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}. Они способны наносить значительный урон на малой дистанции и стойко переносить получение урона, а также отвлекать на себя внимание противников, чтобы защитить более уязвимых союзников.
Ключевые особенности: ближний бой, движение и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g}, провокации, поглощение урона.

traits.locale_text:
Fighters are combatants boasting exceptional melee prowess, capable of dealing high damage in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Focal Points: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.

Warriors are combatants boasting exceptional {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} prowess, capable of dealing high damage in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.

Warriors are combatants boasting exceptional {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} prowess, capable of dealing high damage in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.

languages.text:
战士拥有极其强大的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}能力，可以在近距离战斗中造成极高伤害，同时承受敌人大量攻击。此外，战士还很擅长转移敌人的注意力，将敌人的目光从较为脆弱的盟友身上吸引走。
核心：近战，移动，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，嘲讽敌人，吸收伤害。
languages.original_text:
Warriors are combatants boasting exceptional {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} prowess, capable of dealing high damage in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.

traits.locale_text:
战士拥有极其强大的近战能力，可以在近距离战斗中造成极高伤害，同时承受敌人大量攻击。此外，战士还很擅长转移敌人的注意力，将敌人的目光从较为脆弱的盟友身上吸引走。
核心：近战，移动，{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，嘲讽敌人，吸收伤害。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}拥有极其强大的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}能力，可以在近距离战斗中造成极高{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，同时承受敌人大量攻击。此外，战士还很擅长转移敌人的注意力，将敌人的目光从较为脆弱的盟友身上吸引走。
核心：近战，移动，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}，嘲讽敌人，吸收伤害。

languages.text:
Los guerreros son combatientes especializados en el {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, capaces de realizar poderosos ataques y de resistir grandes cantidades de daño. También son expertos a la hora de atraer la atención de los enemigos para cubrir a sus aliados.
Especialidades: cuerpo a cuerpo, movimiento y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}, provocación, absorción de daño.
languages.original_text:
Warriors are combatants boasting exceptional {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} prowess, capable of dealing high damage in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.

traits.locale_text:
Los guerreros son combatientes especializados en el cuerpo a cuerpo, capaces de realizar poderosos ataques y de resistir grandes cantidades de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}. También son expertos a la hora de atraer la atención de los enemigos para cubrir a sus aliados.
Especialidades: cuerpo a cuerpo, movimiento y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}, provocación, absorción de daño.

languages.text:
ファイターは乱戦で並外れた活躍を見せる戦闘員だ。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}接近戦{/g}で高いダメージを与え、多量のダメージに耐える能力を持つ。また、守りの薄い仲間に向けられた敵の注意を自分に向けることにも長けている。
コアフォーカス：近接攻撃、移動と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、やじ、被ダメージ集中。

Warriors are combatants boasting exceptional {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} prowess, capable of dealing high damage in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}れた活躍を見せる戦闘員だ。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}接近戦{/g}で高いダメージを与え、多量の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に耐える能力を持つまた、守りの薄い仲間に向けられた敵の注意を自分に向けることにも長けている。
コアフォーカス：近接攻撃、移動と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}、やじ、被ダメージ集中。

Бойцы демонстрируют исключительную эффективность в ближнем бою. Они способны наносить значительный урон на малой дистанции и стойко переносить получение урона, а также отвлекать на себя внимание противников, чтобы защитить более уязвимых союзников.
Ключевые особенности: ближний бой, движение и {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g}, провокации, поглощение урона.

Бойцы демонстрируют исключительную эффективность в ближнем бою. Они способны наносить значительный урон на малой дистанции и стойко переносить получение урона, а также отвлекать на себя внимание противников, чтобы защитить более уязвимых союзников.
Ключевые особенности: ближний бой, движение и {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g}, провокации, поглощение урона.

languages.text:
Krieger sind mit außergewöhnlichen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampffähigkeiten{/g} ausgestattet. Sie sind in der Lage, im Nahkampf gewaltig auszuteilen und selbst großen Schaden einzustecken. Sie zeichnen sich auch dadurch aus, dass sie die Aufmerksamkeit der Feinde von Verbündeten mit schwächerer Verteidigung ablenken.
Schwerpunkte: Nahkampf, Bewegung und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, Verhöhnen, Schaden auf sich ziehen.
languages.original_text:
Warriors are combatants boasting exceptional {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} prowess, capable of dealing high damage in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.

traits.locale_text:
Krieger sind mit außergewöhnlichen Nahkampffähigkeiten ausgestattet. Sie sind in der Lage, im Nahkampf gewaltig auszuteilen und selbst großen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} einzustecken. Sie zeichnen sich auch dadurch aus, dass sie die Aufmerksamkeit der Feinde von Verbündeten mit schwächerer Verteidigung ablenken.
Schwerpunkte: Nahkampf, Bewegung und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, Verhöhnen, Schaden auf sich ziehen.

languages.text:
Les guerriers possèdent des aptitudes exceptionnelles en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}. Ils sont à la fois capables d'infliger des dégâts importants au corps à corps et d'encaisser de lourdes frappes. Ils excellent également dans l'art de détourner l'attention des ennemis des alliés les plus vulnérables.
Points forts : mêlée, déplacement et {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}, provocation, absorption des dégâts.
languages.original_text:
Warriors are combatants boasting exceptional {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} prowess, capable of dealing high damage in close quarters combat and withstanding heavy amounts of damage. They also excel at drawing enemies' attention from less defended allies.
Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.

traits.locale_text:
Les Combattants possèdent des aptitudes exceptionnelles en mêlée. Ils sont à la fois capables d'infliger des dégâts importants au corps à corps et d'encaisser de lourdes frappes. Ils excellent également dans l'art de détourner l'attention des ennemis des alliés les plus vulnérables.
Points forts : mêlée, déplacement et {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g}, provocation, absorption des dégâts.

languages.text:
Savaşçılar, göğüs göğüse çarpışmalarda yüksek hasar verebilen ve ağır hasarlara dayanabilen, olağanüstü {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} maharetlerine sahip muharebe ustalarıdır. Ayrıca düşmanların dikkatini daha savunmasız dost birimlerden alıp kendi üstlerine çekmekte uzmandırlar.
Güçlü yönleri: Yakın dövüş, hareket ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g}, sataşmalar, hasar emme.

Core focus: melee, movement and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, taunts, soaking damage.
